item.title: Climber Workout
item.description: Movement’s Quarantine Workout for Rebalancing and Rebuilding: B: BEGINNER, I: INTERMEDIATE, A : ADVANCE PUSHUPS Warmup - External Rotations x10 and 5 slow pushups. B: Kneeling Push-ups 3 sets 10 reps I: Normal Pushups 3 sets 10 reps A: Lizard Pushups 3 sets 10 reps (5per leg) HANDSTAND WALKS Warmup - Wrist Circles 8 each direction and Downward Dog B: 1 Walk in&out with 10 sec hold I: 2 Walks with 3 sec hold A: 3 Walks with 3 sec hold BRIDGE ROTATIONS Warmup - Crab Pose 20 sec and Sphinx 20 sec B: Wall Rotations 3 sets 6 reps (3 per arm) I: Floor 3/4 Rotations 3 sets 6 reps A: Floor Full Rotations 3 sets 6 reps TUCK PLANCHE Warmup - 10 Scapular Pushups B: Chair/Stool w/ Feet Below Hands 3 sets 10 secs I: Feet lvl w/ Hands 3 sets 10 secs A: Hands on Floor High Feet 3 sets 10 secs L-SITS Warmup - Active Forward Fold 30 secs B:Chair/Stool Tuck Sit w/ knees tucked high 3 sets 10 secs I: Low Legs Straight 3 sets 10 secs A: Legs Straight lvl w/ Hands 3 sets 10 secs PISTOL SQUATS Warmup - 10 slow Full Range Squats and End Range Holds 10 sec per leg x2 B: Rolling to End Range + Squat 3 sets 10 reps (5 per leg) I: Rolling to Stand 3 sets 10 reps (5/leg) A: Pistol Squats 3 sets 10 reps (5/leg) PULL UPS Warmup - Scapular Shrugs x 5 reps B: Jumping Negatives 3 sets 3 reps I & A: Pull Ups 3 sets 6-10 reps
